h3_title: Yaoguai Chief - Cloudy Mist, Misty Cloud
content: Misty Cloud will soon appear, though he will look almost see-through initially. He will often pop up as soon as Cloudy Mist has finished a set of moves, hoping to catch you off guard and hit you with his flaming bundle.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Furnace_Valley_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Furnace Valley Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Valley Entrance' and the sub-subsection 'Yaoguai Chief - Cloudy Mist, Misty Cloud'.
The content is as follows:
Misty Cloud will soon appear, though he will look almost see-through initially. He will often pop up as soon as Cloudy Mist has finished a set of moves, hoping to catch you off guard and hit you with his flaming bundle.
